revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2830n |revision= |asin=B01MV99GO0, B005D9R3V2 |fcc_date=01/23/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |availability=common |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=RRK-WMPND02A1 |ic_id=4833A-WMPND02A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Infineon (Lantiq) |cpu1_model=PSB 50712;DANUBE-S; |cpu1_cspeed=333 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405DMI-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS32M16CS-5T |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-N08 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=DrayTek |default_ssid_regex=^DrayTek$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Dual WAN ADSL2+ Security Firewall}} :[http://www.draytek.com/user/PdInfoDetail.php?Id=131 Product page] ([http://www.draytek.com/en/products/products-a-z/router.all/vigor2832-series 2832 series])
Per the manual, the default SSID is ''DrayTek''.
The wireless module for this device may be :the [[Alpha Networks WMP-N08]].
